alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Waller; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL COLORADO...NORTHEASTERN WHARTON...AUSTIN...NORTHWESTERN FORT BEND...SOUTHERN WALLER AND NORTHWESTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 214 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Pine Island to near Sealy to 12 miles southwest of Eagle Lake. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Rosenberg, Katy, Richmond, Wharton, Sealy, Brookshire, Bellville, Columbus, Eagle Lake, Pecan Grove, western Eldridge / West Oaks, southwestern Addicks Park Ten, Hockley, East Bernard, Wallis, Fulshear, Pine Island, Simonton, San Felipe, and Beasley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Waller; Wharton
